titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of September 2024 as "National Recovery Month".
A resolution supporting the designation of September 2024 as "National Recovery Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of September 2024 as National Recovery Month and recognizes the importance of education to prevent substance use disorders.
